benchmark_details.name: QED: A Framework and Dataset for Explanations in Question Answering
benchmark_details.overview: QED is a linguistically Grounded definition of QA explanations in the context of a dataset with expert-annotated QED explanations based on a subset of the Google Natural Questions dataset.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a framework for explanations in question answering and facilitate research by introducing a dataset of QED annotations.
tasks: Joint question answering and explanation generation

data.source: Expert-annotated corpus based on the Google Natural Questions dataset

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on prediction accuracy of the joint question answering and explanation generation tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 Score and Accuracy indicates better performance in generating explanations and answers.
methodology.baseline_results: Reports F1 Score for Task 1 and Task 2 across different model variations.
